name: Bumper Crop
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You channel magic into the earth for 15 minutes, causing crops of your choice to take root in the area. They quickly grow to maturity over the span of one hour, regardless of the viability of the soil. Any creature that partakes in eating these crops is healed for the equivalent of three of their hit dice.

Each space in the area of effect can feed one creature. A creature can only eat once per rest. When the spell ends, the crops wither and die even if they were picked.
